title: Rakan and Xayah's summoner's icon
body:
Hey there
So last night, I've sent Rakan to a friend with IP. She opened it there's an hour ago.
Will I still get the icon with Xayah and Rakan facing eachother? Because I'm really wondering this :|

replies.body: The [**event to get the icon**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions) ran from Apr 19-26. Since you sent the gift last night, with IP, you should still be getting the icon! It doesn't really matter when she 'opened' the gift, as that notification is just that, a notification. Rakan was added to her account before the event ended, so you should still be getting it within 2 weeks!

Alright, I was just afraid, cuz imo this is the best icon along with Koi Nami icon so far ;u;

Ty Broporo !
No worries Edenn! Those new Rakan/Xayah icons _**ARE**_ pretty sick aren't they?!?!

Well I mean, when you're playing, it's always something that you can use with bae :o
...or that reminds you the fact that you're still single :x

{{champion:497}}  is true bae if you ask me! 

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

It would be the true bae if I was gay :x
But {{champion:498}} is better.
At least better than {{champion:103}}, since that {{champion:103}} was a succubus.
(I wanted to put a joke about the "b" word, but I was like "Let's keep my account secured")
